title: Shareable slug URL for Valentine page

requirements.summary: Support opening the Valentine experience from a URL-safe slug path containing the phrase “mujhe to tu psnd hai”.
acceptanceCriteria: A URL-safe slug is defined that preserves the phrase (e.g., by converting spaces to hyphens) while keeping the phrase recognizable in the URL.
Opening the app at the slug URL renders the same Valentine experience as the default root URL (no blank page, no errors).
The existing root URL continues to work unchanged.

file_operations.description: Define and export the canonical, URL-safe slug for the exact phrase (e.g., "mujhe-to-tu-psnd-hai") plus small helpers to (a) recognize allowed paths and (b) build the canonical share URL from window.location.origin.

Add minimal path handling so both the root path and the canonical slug path render ValentinePage; use the helper(s) from frontend/src/lib/shareSlug.ts to match and normalize the current window.location.pathname (ensure no errors/blank screen when loaded directly at the slug).

requirements.summary: Show a copyable share link in the Valentine UI that includes the custom slug, with English sharing/copy labels.
acceptanceCriteria: The page shows a copyable share link that includes the custom slug with the phrase in it.
Copying the link produces a valid URL that can be pasted into a new tab and loads the Valentine page successfully.
All user-facing UI labels related to sharing/copying are in English.

file_operations.description: Expose the canonical share URL in the UI (e.g., a visible link + a "Copy link" control) using helpers from frontend/src/lib/shareSlug.ts and the browser clipboard API; keep share/copy labels in English. Use shadcn-ui components already present in the page (e.g., Button/Card) to keep styling consistent. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
